title: Jimmy Carter National Historic Site: Field Trips
body: Field Trips      The Jimmy Carter National Historic Site includes the Plains High School Museum, the Plains Depot, and the Jimmy Carter Boyhood Farm providing the perfect indoor and outdoor classrooms for field trip studies. Teachers have several options available for bringing students to visit the park. We can assist you in arranging guided day programs or self-guided tours. For any additional information or to schedule a field trip, please contact: Patty Kuehn  229-942-0045 or by e-mail. Education Program Request Form     Results  There are no results to show.
